text: Ticket #12847: Customer reports that the mobile app crashes when trying to upload photos. Issue started yesterday after the latest app update (version 2.3.1). User has iPhone 12 running iOS 16.4. Error occurs consistently when selecting photos from gallery. App works fine for text posts and comments. Customer has already tried restarting phone and reinstalling app with no success. Priority: High - affecting multiple users based on app store reviews.

analyzer.analysis: The content is a technical support issue report detailing a problem with the mobile app on an iPhone 12 running iOS 16.4. The customer is experiencing consistent crashes when trying to upload photos after updating the app (version 2.3.1). The issue has been reported by multiple users, as evident from the App Store reviews.

classifier.reasoning: The content is a technical support issue report, specifically about a software problem with the mobile app. The priority level is high because it affects multiple users and the customer has already tried troubleshooting steps.
